name: Artemisa
description:
Welcome to Artemisa, the wonderful game where the planets are shrinking. Will you be able to survive to infinite waves of enemy ships in the six different worlds Artemisa has?

Except for some particle effects that are extracted from Unreal Content Examples and the music, all the content, textures and meshes has been developed by us.

Song credits:

1.  http://freemusicarchive.org/music/Rockit_Maxx/Be_Electric/Rockit_Maxx_-_Be_Elect...

2. http://www.reverbnation.com/teknoaxe
